tag_list: ricky-diaz, thronebuzz, throne-media, thronemag, entertainment, music, movies
overview:
Ricky Diaz is the founder and CEO of Throne Media Group.

Since starting Throne Media Group, Ricky Diaz has earned the reputation of having his finger on the pulse of entertainment. A celebrity interviewer, entrepreneur, actor, producer, promoter, graphics artist, web designer, and innovator; Diaz has worked amongst the top in the entertainment industry.

In April of 2007, after graduating high school at the age of 17, Diaz started Thronebuzz.com and quickly made a name for himself in the entertainment industry and began developing important connections. Setting up several crews of interns and employees in major cities across the eastern US, he began working with several top record labels, movie studios, companies, and a long list of Hollywood’s top artists. Ricky Diaz has many affiliations throughout the music and entertainment industries. This has led to Diaz becoming a young Internet icon with an impressive following and an increasing fan base.
